entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
